text: ASPERA-3 and MEX OA IDFS data and any APAF-generated intermediate files of ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry shall be provided to all ASPERA-3 Co-I’s.
The HATS-GUI shall allow the user to select the shapes for types of displayed nodes in a displayed graph.
The user shall be able to resize windows dynamically.
At the main title screen, the user will be able to view a general help screen to reveal basic instructions on game play.
All users of the system shall login using some form of unique identification.
In many network, only system administrator is allowed to send broadcast message.
The product must count and display the number of the user's action.
The system must be able to include new members in the network through simple administrative tasks.
Purchasing Manager is responsible for the arrangement and maintenance of trading agreements with suppliers, including Catalogue data.
Fulfilment Notification is sent by the Despatch Point (Seller) to inform the Delivery Point (Buyer) that goods have been despatched or delivered or that a service has been performed.
Scientific users will use the system to manage input data, run simulations, visualize results, and manage output data.
Scenario where the user wants to publish output data for the community, i.e. directly publish the data on dataportal.
The system shall display a list of all the output tiles to the user.
Auditor, Person appointed to manage County business by a majority vote of District Judges that have jurisdiction in the County.
The System should be able to provide reports for actions on cases organised by workstation and (where technically appropriate) by network address.
If a user requests access to, or searches for, a case which he does not have the right to access, the System must provide following responses.
Presiding Administrative Judge, Person appointed by the Governor to preside over the administrative judicial region.
The interfaces must be made customizable or user-configurable to the extent possible. (e.g., the displayed columns in the table, move, resize, modify the appearance).
When an operator is making changes on the system, the GUI configuration screen shall display to the user which device, controller, or workstation in the RLCS network will be affected by the changes.
Ability to disable access for old project managers, analysts and guests.

Sales Personnel: Is generally the owner of the Web Store tasked with updating inventory and product line descriptions. Once added, sales personnel can add, delete and change descriptions, pictures, prices, and when ready flag items for customers to buy.
Shall install online help for users via the web interface.
Ability to view access control policies
The system shall provide templates for goals, scenarios, P3P statments, EPAL rules and access control policies.
The system shall allow analysts to add a scenario to the system.
Customers will be able to search for products matching their search criteria.

Inventory administrators: users that can be delegated by any administrative level to work and on the applications assigned permission can varies from one user to another depending on its assigned tasks.
Any DA group member or authorised inventory group member asset is owned by the department
Any administrative level user can delegate another user to execute some or all his authorized actions. And this user acquires the role of inventory administrator
The Clarus system shall allow access to new surface transportation related observed environmental data.
The Clarus system shall accept environmental data from railway systems or in situ ESS along tracks.
The Clarus system shall provide notification of data quality conditions to data collectors.
The Clarus system shall be able to base its quality control process on historical environmental data.
The Clarus system shall maintain a dynamic library of data for at least seven days.
The Clarus system shall record statistics about its operation.
The Clarus system shall acquire, process, and disseminate hydrologic data.
The Clarus system shall acquire, process, and disseminate environmental sensor station metadata.
The Clarus system shall employ industry standards to minimize implementation impact to users and providers.
Users of any MultiMahjongClient previously connected to the game will have the choice to quit the program or to begin/join a new game.
The Clarus system shall disseminate data in response to a scheduled request.

The software will provide the UAV operator the necessary tools for computer related communications, mission tasking, mission planning, mission execution, data receipt, data processing, limited data exploitation, and data dissemination.
The Clarus system shall be able to handle three hundred simultaneous requests for environmental element data.
The Clarus program shall maintain continuous 24x7 operations.
The Clarus program shall provide documentation of Clarus standards.
The VMU will create the vouchers and sell it to clients through distributors.
Based on the payment terms agreed by VSP, the field office will generate BiMonth or Monthly financial and medical report and send it to MSIU Admin team to arrange the payments for the VSP.
Systems supporting OM should be able to provide the aggregate data necessary for health event monitoring to systems that support response tracking
Case investigation should be supported by reusable questionnaire libraries that use common terminology (where available) to maximize the efficiency of data exchange.
The user shall be able to create a new inspection by copying a previous inspection.
The user shall be able to split a project into multiple projects and combine multiple projects into a master project.
The system shall be capable of validating user name and password during log-in process.
Allow the user to add, remove, modify or back up (to removable storage devices) arbitrary pieces of information without disrupting the hierarchy.
View entire universe of watersheds from top-level screen for selection
The system shall display all the products that can be configured.
The system shall enable user to enter the search text on the screen.
The system shall allow user to select the order from the order history.
The system shall display the FAQ’s upon request.
The system shall display tentative duration for shipping.
The system shall allow user to change shipping, payment method.
The system shall allow user to confirm the purchase.
The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability.
The system shall allow a user to make public emergency point-to-point voice calls.
National values shall be applicable to a defined area.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect probe vehicle data from truck fleets using the truck fleets’ interfaces.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect roadway traffic data from the MITS Center using the MITS traffic data interface.
The DUAP System shall be able to collect work zone (lane closure) data.
The DUAP Output Services shall be able to publish traffic data in the SimTraffic traffic analysis tool SimTraffic interface format.
The System shall provide the capability to send an electronic notification to authorized users when they receive restricted access data.
The System shall be capable of generating NOAA-Unique and Tailored Data Products with Government-specified grid spacing.
Accepts content from physical media (DVDs, external drives, etc.) or via electronic transfer (FTP) from producers.
Stores and tracks versions of a document/file/image.  Links /connections between versions are created and maintained.
Moves and adds AIPs to storage within the repository
Query requests are received from other functions (for example, Ingest, Access, and Administration).
Keeps an audit trail of all actions.
Keeps an audit trail of all actions.
Submits change requests, procedures and tools to Archive Information Update.
One of the fundamental tasks of the system is to allow actors to upload and manage files on certain pages of the system.
Actors should be able to search for pages at the course level, since most actors will be searching for material in a given course.
The system should display grade information such as the grade for each assignment, averages, and overall grade to the actor to whom the grades belong.
Furthermore, this interface must allow administrators to easily change themes and other setting that affect page layout across the entire courseware system.
The system will also provide information on WUPs that can support the establishment and monitoring of Minimum Flows and Levels.
Identify when a standby permit is reactivated due to the loss of alternative quantities.
The CAISO maintains a Black Start database that contains all Black Start generators designated for use during a system restoration.
Also the user can search the database using key words through a search engine provided with the software.
Mediator generates service requirements as the basis for negotiated relationships.
Peering Agent exchanges policy, resource information, and service requirements with external Peering Agent.
The mediator instance obtains resource and access information from the Service Registry and policy information from Policy Repository to establish negotiation.
Peering Agent exchange content availability and load information to identify an optimal peer to handle user requests.
User can click on [ add new customer ] link, to add a new customer to the system.
Users will also be able to choose their font as well as font color for their profile page.
Students will be able to use this same feature when working on projects as teams, giving them the ability to all work on one document at the same time.
If the user is connected to the VUB network, then he/she should be redirected to the search page when he logs oﬀ.
the actor can download all the publications in a search result by clicking on the Download button next to ”All” at the bottom of the screen.
Donor: An individual or organization who donates items to the Construction Junction inventory and receives a tax deduction for doing so.
The system should allow Construction Junction to reward customers for frequent donating by giving them in-store credit that can be used when purchasing items.
The system shall provide an online, hierarchical, and cross-linked help system in HTML that describes and illustrates all system functions.
System Administration Module shall use a fully relational database back-end.
System allows creation and modification of requesting rules that determine whether a patron can place a hold on an item.
Ability to define and select four types of printers: receipt printer, standard printer, label printer, and forms printer.

Users are allowed to compress one or more objects (files or archives) in one or more compressed archive volumes (sizing less or equally to the original ones)in one of the offered for compression by PeaZip formats.
The software will use hyperlinks to allow the user to open websites in their default web browser.
A conﬁguration must be provided explicitly, errors should be generated in the absence of a conﬁguration.
The ELSS must capture all data necessary for recording the fishing activities undertaken by a UK fishing vessel.
The ELSS must only permit correction messages to be generated and sent for reports sent during a current trip up to the submission of the End of Fishing report for that voyage
The system shall include digital programmable thermostats, which shall be used to monitor and regulate the temperature of an enclosed space.
The DigitalHome System shall provide users with online documentation about the DigitalHome system installed in their home.
The system is conﬁgurable to e-mail warnings about multiple failed login attempts from the same user.
Users can understand how PDFsam responds to their actions by viewing the log messages in the log panel.
Each visit details (including Diagnosis, Lab Test and Drugs) of the patient is called a claim,
